title: We released a neumber of new reports: self-speculation with Diffusion LLMs TiDAR; multimodal LLMs: OmniVinci, OmniVinci; many-in-one LLM Nemotron-Elastic; VLM with great OCR capabilities NVIDIA Nemotron Nano V2 VL; and how we built VLA for AV Alpamayo-R1.

Projects this month: converting AR to Diffusion LMMs, FastDLLM2; VLM for medical imaging NV-Reason-CXR-3B; efficeint RL with BroRL, and benchmark ProfBench; how we can cut reasoning trace by 3x - DLER.
At GTC-DC a couple of new open models were announced, we contributed: Nemotron Nano 3, Nemotron Nano 2 VL, Nemotron Parse, Clara Reason.
We have 5 papers accepted to NeurIPS 2025, see you in San Diego! Nemotron-CLIMB, Nemotron-Flash, GSPN-2, Long-RL, Minitron-SSM.
New NVIDIA-Nemotron-Nano-v2-9B is released on Hugging Face. We contributed to the compression part, architecture and data filtering.
